content.raw:
We could have the image display there by default, like this:

~~~
diff -r 764c804a8942 examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf
--- a/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Fri Jan 04 14:17:33 2019 -0800
+++ b/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Fri Jan 04 14:23:51 2019 -0800
@@ -88,6 +88,12 @@
 
       </plugin>
 
+      <plugin filename="ImageDisplay" name="Image Display">
+        <ignition-gui>
+          <property key="state" type="string">docked</property>
+        </ignition-gui>
+      </plugin>
+
     </gui>
 
     <light type="directional" name="sun">
~~~
content.html:
We could have the image display there by default, like this:

diff -r 764c804a8942 examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf
--- a/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Fri Jan 04 14:17:33 2019 -0800
+++ b/examples/worlds/camera_sensor.sdf Fri Jan 04 14:23:51 2019 -0800
@@ -88,6 +88,12 @@

       </plugin>

+      <plugin filename="ImageDisplay" name="Image Display">
+        <ignition-gui>
+          <property key="state" type="string">docked</property>
+        </ignition-gui>
+      </plugin>
+
     </gui>

     <light type="directional" name="sun">
